column4: CEO of Google and Alphabet. Focused on organizing the world's information and making it universally accessible and useful, building great products, and developing advanced technologies, including AI, to help people everywhere.
As chairman and CEO of Microsoft, I define my mission and that of my company as empowering every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

column2: Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, IBM
column4: Technologist, business leader, and fan of wild ducks. I believe innovation starts with insane curiosity, passion for lifelong learning, and relentless focus on whatâ€™s next. I am proud to lead a company that has been changing the way the world works for clients for 109 years. At IBM, we are driving the future of digital transformation with advanced technology, industry expertise, and trust.
